text:
Hello,

I wrote a small Task that prompts the user for input and stores the received 
line into a property... I think that this task could be useful to other 
people as well. Unfortunatly, im sitting behind a firewall and don't know
how to access your cvs repository, so I will attach the source to this bugzilla 
entry...
creator: michel.marti@ubs.com

text: Will be discussed in the context of Ant2.
creator: bodewig@apache.org

text: Nightly builds since 2001-12-01 have an <input> task.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
